nodes.speaker: Loki
nodes.text: So… you made it. Not by accident, not by mercy—by selection.

nodes.speaker: Loki
nodes.text: Before Dreadheim remakes you, it tests you. Quietly. Patiently. Like frost creeping under a door.

nodes.speaker: Loki
nodes.text: And you… you leaned the right way.

nodes.speaker: Loki
nodes.text: Not “evil” like a child thinks. Not cackling. Not stupid.

nodes.speaker: Loki
nodes.text: Evil like Dreadheim prefers—willing to take what’s needed, to survive, to win… and to enjoy it when the world begs you not to.

nodes.speaker: Loki
nodes.text: That is why your soul was accepted. That is why you were reborn here.

nodes.speaker: Loki
nodes.text: Now tell me… what name do you want this land to remember?
